task.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS kungfu_task(name VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, task_type char(10), config VARCHAR NOT NULL);

accounts.sql: create table if not exists td_config(account_id char(50) PRIMARY KEY, source_name char(50), config);
create table if not exists md_config(source_name char(50) PRIMARY KEY, config);

strategys.sql: create table if not exists strategys(strategy_id char(20) PRIMARY KEY, strategy_path char(250), add_time int);
